title: Pixel 3 RMA - 14 days and counting - Google LOST my phone!
content:
Pixel 3 was sent for RMA on Monday 6th April. Google promised turn-around of 5 to 10 days.

Tracking indicates the device arrived at warehouse on 14th April.

Google has yet to acknowledge the device has been received.

10+ emails sent to Neil from the "Shipping and Refunds" team yielded no results and no meaningful updates - told to "wait patiently". 

Request for escalation to management left unanswered. No timeline, SLA, or next course of action provided despite multiple requests.

Google has taken my phone and held it hostage.

Please help.

IDs:
RMA02670726
Case ID [9-1342000030165]
